branding.tagline: All the data, none of the headache

CONNECTION_NAME.label: Connection Name
CONNECTION_NAME.description: The connection that houses your GA360 data (it should have been created using Fivetran).

SCHEMA_NAME.label: Schema Name
SCHEMA_NAME.description: The schema name of your GA360 data.

GA360_TABLE_NAME.label: GA360 Table Name
GA360_TABLE_NAME.description: The table name of your GA360 data (this should end with a _* due to date partitioned tables).

CONFIG_PROJECT_NAME.label: Config Project Name
CONFIG_PROJECT_NAME.description: The name of the associated config project.
